scripts.db:migrate: knex migrate:latest --env development && knex migrate:latest --env test
scripts.db:seed: knex seed:run --env development; knex seed:run --env test
scripts.db:migrate:undo: knex migrate:rollback --env development && knex migrate:rollback --env test
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:drop; npm run db:create; npm run db:migrate; npm run db:seed
scripts.note: NOTE: NPM module, /lib config file  node -r to require files we need
